alert.note: Alert for Black Mesa Area; Chuska Mountains and Defiance Plateau; White Mountains (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 13 at 3:01PM MST until December 15 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM TUESDAY TO 11 AM MST WEDNESDAY ABOVE 6500 FEET... * WHAT...Snow expected above 6500 feet. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 4 inches, with locally higher amounts possible. Southerly wind gusts as high as 65 mph expected with blowing snow. * WHERE...Areas above 6500 feet near Alpine, Buffalo Pass, Pinetop-Lakeside, Shonto, Show Low and Window Rock. * WHEN...From 11 PM Tuesday to 11 AM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Blowing snow will significantly reduce visibility resulting in whiteout conditions and very hazardous travel. Very strong winds could cause extensive tree damage and power outages. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The Winter Weather Advisory has been upgraded to a Winter Storm Warning. Snow forecast from 11 PM Tuesday to 11 AM Wednesday: Alpine 0 to 1 inches Buffalo Pass 2 to 4 inches Pinetop-Lkside 1 to 2 inches Shonto 1 to 3 inches Show Low 0 to 1 inches Window Rock 1 to 3 inches .
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
